INGREDIENTS 
 1 medium eggplant 
 2 tablespoons mustard oil 
 4-5 cloves garlic 
 2-3 red chili 
 Â¼ onion, thinly sliced 
 Cilantro 
 Salt to taste 
 INSTRUCTIONS 
 1. Roast eggplant, garlic and chili on stove top or in the oven until tender. 
 2. Mash/paste garlic, chili and salt together. Add onion. 
 3. Add roasted eggplant and mash together. Add cilantro. 
 4. Add oil and mix well. 
 NOTES 
 I cut eggplants in big chunks and wrap in aluminum foil to roast on stove top. For oven roasting, cut the eggplant in half inch slices. Adjust oil, chili and garlic according to taste.
